Room.Name: Brownhaven Way/Nathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: This is the southern end of Brownhaven Way where it meets Nathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Nathan Drive runs parallel to the village wall. Brownhaven Way is one of the nicer streets in the village, and as you look north, it appears to be a shady, tree lined street with quiet little shops tucked into amongst the bushes. There's an odd looking tree growing here, however. Looks like it may well be several hundred years old. It stands in a very small cemetery on the northeast side of the intersection.
